languages.text: "Когда Иремерисс приказала опустошить селения мон-кай, мы с Тазаррой столкнулись с сопротивлением. Я слишком давно охочусь на твоих соплеменников, чтобы не заметить, как успешно ты сопротивлял{mf|ся|ась} нашим атакам. Разгром арены Тазарры, появление на месте разграбления судна... ваше племя беспомощно против наших атак, но в этот раз было иначе. Я начал подозревать, что дело не обошлось без помощи со стороны. С нашей стороны".

traits.locale_text: "Когда Иремерисс приказала опустошить селения мон-кай, мы с Тазаррой столкнулись с твоим сопротивлением. Я слишком давно охочусь на мон-кай, чтобы не заметить то, как успешно ты сопротивлял{mf|ась|ся} нашим атакам. Разгром маленькой аренки Тазарры, явление на место разграбления мон-кайского судна... ваше племя беспомощно против наших атак, но в этот раз было иначе. Я начал подозревать, что дело не обошлось без помощи со стороны. С нашей стороны".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."
languages.original_text: "Когда Иремерисс приказала опустошить селения мон-кай, мы с Тазаррой столкнулись с сопротивлением. Я слишком давно охочусь на твоих соплеменников, чтобы не заметить, как успешно ты сопротивлял{mf|ся|ась} нашим атакам. Разгром арены Тазарры, появление на месте разграбления судна... ваше племя беспомощно против наших атак, но в этот раз было иначе. Я начал подозревать, что дело не обошлось без помощи со стороны. С нашей стороны".

I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando Yremeryss nos ordenó que asoláramos los asentamientos mon-keigh, Tazarra y yo encontramos resistencia. Llevo demasiado tiempo cazando a tu especie para no darme cuenta de que estabas rechazando nuestros ataques con demasiada competencia. La debacle en la arena de Tazarra, tu aparición en la nave saqueada... por lo general tu gente es impotente contra nosotros, pero esa vez no. Empecé a sospechar que no podíais haberlo hecho sin ayuda externa. Sin ayuda de alguien de nuestro bando».
languages.original_text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando Yremeryss nos ordenó que asoláramos los asentamientos mon-keigh, Tazarra y yo encontramos resistencia. Llevo demasiado tiempo cazando a tu especie para no darme cuenta de que estabas rechazando nuestros ataques con demasiada competencia. La debacle en la arena de Tazarra, tu aparición en la nave saqueada... por lo general tu gente es impotente contra nosotros, pero esa vez no. Empecé a sospechar que no podíais haberlo hecho sin ayuda externa. Sin ayuda de alguien de nuestro bando».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “伊芮梅莉斯命令我和塔扎菈摧毁猴子的定居点时，我们的狩猎遭遇了抵抗。很久以来，我们一直在猎杀你们的族人，但一直都没遇到过像样的反击。无论是塔扎菈竞技场里那些溃不成军的斗士，还是我们劫掠的船上那些不值一提的船员……通常而言，你的族群在我们面前毫无还手之力，可那次却不一样。于是我开始怀疑，你们肯定是得到了外援，而那个外援是我们的人。”
languages.original_text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

traits.locale_text: “伊芮梅莉斯命令我和塔扎菈摧毁猴子的定居点时，我们的狩猎遭遇了抵抗。很久以来，我们一直在猎杀你们的族人，但一直都没遇到过像样的反击。无论是塔扎菈竞技场里那些溃不成军的斗士，还是我们劫掠的船上那些不值一提的船员……通常而言，你的族群在我们面前毫无还手之力，可那次却不一样。于是我开始怀疑，你们肯定是得到了外援，而那个外援是我们的人。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「イレメリスがモン＝ケイの居住地を破壊するよう命じたとき、タザーラと俺は抵抗勢力とぶつかった。お前の同族をあまりにも長く狩りまくっていたせいか、お前たちが我々の攻撃をどれほど上手くかわしていたのか気づかなかったんだ。タザーラの闘技場での敗走、略奪された船でのあの姿…お前の同族たちはいつだって俺たちにとっては無力だったのに、その時は違った。俺はお前たちに協力する者が外部にいるのではないかと疑い始めた。俺たちの内部にいる者がな」
languages.original_text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

traits.locale_text: 「イレメリスがモン＝ケイの居住地を破壊するよう命じたとき、タザーラと俺は抵抗勢力とぶつかった。お前の同族をあまりにも長く狩りまくっていたせいか、お前たちが我々の攻撃をどれほど上手くかわしていたのか気づかなかったんだ。タザーラの闘技場での敗走、略奪された船でのあの姿…お前の同族たちはいつだって俺たちにとっては無力だったのに、その時は違った。俺はお前たちに協力する者が外部にいるのではないかと疑い始めた。俺たちの内部にいる者がな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Quand Yremeryss nous a ordonné de dévaster les colonies mon-keigh, Tazarra et moi nous sommes heurtés à une résistance inattendue. Je chasse les vôtres depuis trop longtemps pour n'avoir pas remarqué l'aisance déconcertante avec laquelle vous repoussiez nos attaques. La déroute dans l'arène de Tazarra, l'apparition inopinée au vaisseau pillé... D'habitude, vos congénères sont impuissants face à nous, mais pas cette fois. C'est là que j'ai commencé à vous soupçonner de bénéficier d'une aide extérieure. Une aide provenant de notre propre camp. »
languages.original_text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

traits.locale_text: « Quand Yremeryss nous a ordonné de dévaster les colonies mon-keigh, Tazarra et moi nous sommes heurtés à une résistance inattendue. Je chasse les vôtres depuis trop longtemps pour n'avoir pas remarqué l'aisance déconcertante avec laquelle vous repoussiez nos attaques. La déroute dans l'arène de Tazarra, l'apparition inopinée au vaisseau pillé... D'habitude, vos congénères sont impuissants face à nous, mais pas cette fois. C'est là que j'ai commencé à vous soupçonner de bénéficier d'une aide extérieure. Une aide provenant de notre propre camp. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Als Yremeryss uns befahl, die Siedlungen der Chem-Pan-Sey dem Erdboden gleichzumachen, stießen Tazarra und ich auf Widerstand. Ich hatte Euer Volk noch nicht lang genug gejagt, um zu bemerken, wie gut besonders Ihr darin wart, unsere Angriffe abzuwehren. Die Niederlage in Tazarras Arena, das Erscheinen bei dem geplünderten Schiff ... Euresgleichen sind meist machtlos gegen uns, doch an diesem Tag war das anders. Ich begann zu vermuten, dass Ihr das nicht ohne Hilfe von außen habt bewerkstelligen können. Hilfe von unserer Seite."
languages.original_text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

Ich begann zu vermuten, dass Ihr das nicht ohne Hilfe von außen habt bewerkstelligen können. Hilfe von unserer Seite."

languages.original_text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

languages.text: "Yremeryss, Tazarra'yla bana mon-keigh yerleşim yerlerini harap etmemizi emretti. Direnişle karşılaştık. Türünüzü uzun zamandır avlıyorum, özellikle de senin saldırılarımızı ne kadar iyi püskürttüğünün farkındayım. Tazarra'nın arenasındaki bozgun, yağmalanan gemide ortaya çıkışın... Sizinkiler genelde bize hiçbir şey yapamaz bu saydıklarım farklıydı. Dışarıdan, yani bizim taraftan yardım almadan böyle bir şeyi başaramayacağından şüphelendim."
languages.original_text: "When Yremeryss ordered us to lay waste to the mon-keigh settlements, Tazarra and I encountered resistance. I have hunted your kin too long not to notice how well you in particular were fending off our attacks. The rout in Tazarra's arena, the appearance at the plundered vessel... your kind are usually powerless against us, but not on that occasion. I began to suspect that you could not have managed it without outside help. Help from our side."

traits.locale_text: "Yremeryss'ten Tazarra'yla bana mon-keigh yerleşim yerlerini harap etme emri geldi ama direnişle karşılaştık. Türünüzü uzun zamandır avlıyorum, saldırılarımızı özellikle de senin ne kadar iyi püskürttüğünün farkındayım. Tazarra'nın arenasındaki bozgun, yağmalanan gemide ortaya çıkışın... Sizinkiler genelde bize hiçbir şey yapamaz ama o seferler farklıydı. Dışarıdan yardım almadan böyle bir şeyi başaramayacağından şüphelendim. Bizim taraftan yani."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
